summary:
If you have a blog, you've probably gotten those emails that want to "collaborate" on a guest postâ€”which often means "let us post sketchy links for SEO purposes. "
Recently, I got one which was a little different flavor than the usual spam, so I bit and replies. 
The end result was at the same time fascinating, unsurprising, and deeply disappointing...

summary:
Way back when I was in fourth grade, I needed something to listen to on the bus to a class field trip. 
Naturally, I turned to my dad, who had a pretty big collection of 80s rock.  I had been listening to music from the likes of REO Speedwagon, Eddie Money, Quiet Riot, Bon Jovi, and a million other groups since my parents got married...
